meanings.definition: A telephone service that allows people to have conversations with others over the phone.
meanings.sent1: I called the chatline to talk to a friendly stranger.
meanings.sent2: The chatline was busy with people chatting about their day.
meanings.sent3: The chatline operator accidentally connected me to a pizza delivery instead of a person!
meanings.sent4: The chatline was like a lifeline connecting me to the outside world.
meanings.sent5: The chatline buzzed with voices eager to connect.

meanings.definition: A website or app that provides a platform for people to communicate with each other in real-time through text messages.
meanings.sent1: I joined a chatline to discuss my favorite TV show with other fans.
meanings.sent2: The chatline had emojis and stickers to make conversations more fun.
meanings.sent3: The chatline suddenly went down just as I was about to send an important message!
meanings.sent4: The chatline was a digital hub where ideas and thoughts flowed freely.
meanings.sent5: The chatline lit up with notifications as friends started chatting.
